info.name: Tregolani Homebrew Spells
info.description: These are some personal homebrew spells. Currently contains: Shockbolt, Lance of Faith, Glacial Snap, Tempest Wall, Crushing Breaker, Forked Lightning, and Storm Conduit
info.author: Tregolani

description.p: You charge your fist and launch an arcing bolt of lightning at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage.
This spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

You conjure a lance of divine energy and hurl it at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 radiant radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 1d6 necrotic damage (if you are evil), and the lance embeds itself within the creature. The first time it is hit by a weapon attack made by a creature other than yourself before the start of your next turn, the lance detonates, dealing radiant (or necrotic) damage equal to your spellcasting modifier.

This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra 1d6 radiant or necrotic damage to the target, and the detonation damage increases to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by 1d6/1d4 at 11th level and 17th level.

element.name: Crushing Breaker
element.supports: Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer, Spell Saving Throw

description.p: A great wave of salt water bursts from the ground beneath your feet. Each creature in a 30-foot cube originating from you must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 4d10 bludgeoning damage and is pushed 15 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is not pushed away.

Along with the wave, you conjure the spirit of a great shark or other powerful sea creature. Choose one creature that failed its saving throw as the spirit's prey. That target takes an extra 2d10 piercing damage and is restrained by the spirit's jaws or claws for 1 minute. A target restrained in this way can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself and the spirit disappears.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or higher, the damage of the wave and spirit each increase by 1d10 for each slot level above 4th.

element.name: Glacial Snap
element.supports: Sorcerer, Wizard, Druid, Spell Saving Throw

description.p: You point at a location within range, and a glowing 1-foot shard of jagged ice streaks there and explodes in a 20-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10d4 cold damage and another 5d4 cold damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the initial damage increases by 2d4 for each slot level above 4th.

element.name: Tempest Wall
element.supports: Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Spell Saving Throw

description.p: You create a wall of sheet lightning on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot think, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot think. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.
When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d8 lightning damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 lightning damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall as bolts of lightning leap out towards it. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

setters.set: a glass bowl and a small metal sphere

description.p: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.
A target must make a Dexterity saving throw. The target takes 8d8 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can choose one of the following for each level above 5th: the damage increases by 2d8 or one additional bolt leaps from the first target to another target.

setters.set: a bit of fur, a piece of amber, glass, or crystal rod, and three silver pins

element.name: Storm Conduit
element.supports: Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Spell Saving Throw

description.p: A scintillating cascade of lightning flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 6d8 lightning damage and is blinded until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't blinded by this spell. Creatures wearing metal armor or carrying metal weapons have disadvantage on this saving throw.
You can create a new blast of lightning as your action on any turn until the spell ends.

For the duration, your body crackles violently with the power of a condensed storm. You shed bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet, and any creature within 15ft of you has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) check to see or listen. In addition, any creature that touches you or hits you with a melee attack takes 2d8 lightning damage.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 6th.
